comment: When Maxine Waters encouraged violence against Trump Cabinet members, it wasnt the first time she displayed behavior unbecoming of a federal lawmaker. She's been involved in many other controversies - including abusing power to enrich family members.

(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Maxine"
                        :op2 "Waters"))
            :ARG1 (b / behave-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1-of (d2 / deem-01
                        :polarity -

                              :ARG0-of (l / legislate-01)
                              :mod (f / federal))))
            :time (e / encourage-02
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (v / violence
                        :prep-against (p3 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (c / cabinet
                                          :poss (p4 / person
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "Trump")))
                                    :ARG2 (m2 / member)))))
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                  :value 1))
      :snt2 (ii / involve-01
            :ARG1 (s / she)
            :ARG2 (c2 / controversy
                  :quant (m3 / many)
                  :mod (o2 / other)
                  :ARG2-of (ii2 / include-91

                              :ARG0 s
                              :ARG1 (p5 / power)
                              :purpose (e2 / enrich-01
                                    :ARG0 s
                                    :ARG1 (p6 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                :ARG1 (f2 / family)
                                                :ARG2 (m4 / member)))))))))
